Name: Slavistan
About the game: Hello Comrades ! You think you got what it takes to be tru slav? Then we have game for you ! Prove to all your gopnik friends that you are the superior alpha slav your babushka always wanted you to be. 3 glorious gamemodes in 3 glorious countries. 6 unlockable characters you can make friends with. hard and fast gameplay that will make you real man.
